lines.text: Mr. Garland, you're not paying attention to me.

[Fondling talisman above sick captain, slowly incants]
SAFERU ANMA PELI GARPURU ANINI I OMO OMOO
Water looks calm; let's go swimming.
I wouldn't do that if I were you.
Let me show you something. Now on the surface the water looks smooth and calm; but underneath there are strange and dangerous things happening. See that weird little fish
[manta ray underside, but with curiously childlike face features!]
he seems contented. There's an odd one
Probably as nice as he looks. And there's a happy little fellow... there's our unsuspecting friend and he's heading for trouble...
and now the rest of the fish see the chance to get rid of their enemy - for as long as that octopus lives, there can be no peace.
